00359 
00360 template <class ReceiverT, class EventT>
00361 void VtdApi::registerEventFunc(ReceiverT* receiver, void (ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT*), const ConnectionHandle& connectionHandle)
00362 {
00363     MessageHandler messageHandle;
00364 
00365     switch (EventT::MsgId)
00366     {
00367         case MESSAGE_RDB:
00368         {
00369             messageHandle.setHandler<EventT>(boost::bind(memberFunc, receiver, boost::placeholders::_1));
00370             connectServiceMap_.find(connectionHandle)->second->handleRDBMessages_.insert(std::make_pair(connectionHandle, messageHandle));
00371         }break;
00372 
00373         case MESSAGE_SCP:
00374         {
00375             messageHandle.setHandler<EventT>(boost::bind(memberFunc, receiver, boost::placeholders::_1));
00376             connectServiceMap_.find(connectionHandle)->second->callbackScp_.push_back(messageHandle);
00377         }break;
00378 
00379         default:
00380             break;
00381     }
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00385 template <class ReceiverT, class EventT>
00386 void VtdApi::deregisterEventFunc(ReceiverT*, void (ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT*), const ConnectionHandle& connectionHandle)
00387 {
00388     if (connectServiceMap_.empty())
00389         return;
00390 
00391     switch (EventT::MsgId)
00392     {
00393         case MESSAGE_RDB:
00394         {
00395             connectServiceMap_.find(connectionHandle)->second->handleRDBMessages_.find(connectionHandle)->second.unsetHandler<EventT>();
00396         }break;
00397 
00398         case MESSAGE_SCP:
00399         {
00400             connectServiceMap_.find(connectionHandle)->second->callbackScp_.back().unsetHandler<EventT>();
00401         }break;
00402 
00403         default:
00404             break;
00405     }
00406 }
00407 
00408 } //namespace VTD
